Title: NUJ@70: Deepfakes, impostors pose threat to journalism, Tinubu, Osoba warn
Summary: Tinubu stated this at the 70th Anniversary Gala, Award Night, and Book Presentation of the Nigeria Union of Journalists . He warned that Nigeria’s democracy and media credibility face growing threats from deepfake technology .

Title: Housing: 753-unit estate linked to Emefiele nears completion –Ministry
Summary: Internal assessment of controversial 753-unit housing estate in Abuja, linked to former Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele, is nearing completion . An official of the Federal Ministry of Housing said the assessment of the estate nears completion .

Title: 2027: Renaissance movement decry alleged muzzling of opposition by Tinubu, Wike
Summary: African Renaissance Movement has accused President Bola Ahmed Tinubu of muzzling the opposition political parties . Ahead of the 2027 poll, the African Renaissance movement decry alleged muzzing of opposition by Tinubue, Wike .

Title: Tinubu deeply involved in June 12 struggle, Lamido knows nothing, says Alake
Summary: Minister of Solid Minerals, Dele Alake, has dismissed claims that President Bola Tinubu supported the annulment of the historic June 12, 1993, presidential election . Alake insists the President was ‘deeply involved’ in the fight to restore the late MKO Abiola’s legitimacy .

Title: Ibas accused of deducting N200m from Rivers council’s funds
Summary: Rivers State Sole Administrator, Vice Admiral Ibok Ete-Ibas (rtd) accused of deducting N200m from Ahoada East Local Government’s monthly allocations . Fresh facts have emerged about the assault and purported resignation of the Sole Administrator of Rivers State .

Summary: The 2025 World Happiness Report was compiled by Oxford University’s Wellbeing Research Centre in collaboration with Gallup and the UN Sustainable Development Solutions Network . Title: Kano to boost maternal, child health services
Summary: The Kano State Government has unveiled a communication plan to boost demand for reproductive, maternal, newborn, child, and adolescent health and nutrition services across the state .
